ygData.subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron watched as the bot speed past. He flipped up to miss the slash and used all his force to go straight down on top of the bot. He was on the bots back.

Received: from Kinger01030@... by imo-d06.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v28.35.) id a.16.7307aae (4530) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Mon, 8 Jan 2001 17:39:07 -0500 (EST)
Message-ID: <16.7307aae.278b9b8b@...>
Date: Mon, 8 Jan 2001 17:39:07 EST
Subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 Galvatron watched as the bot speed past. He flipped up to miss the slash and 
used all his force to go straight down on top of the bot. He was on the bots 
back. He wrapped his legs around the bots waist. He took his left arm and 
grabbed the bots left fore arm to keep it down. He used his right arm to grab 
the bots right forearm. He wrapped his tail around the bots left shoulder and 
yanked it with all his strength to the left. Ripping it off. (because I am 
right on top I am allowed to post some damage.) His teeth shined in the sun. 
He took a large bite into the bots right shoulder. His teeth clenching in. He 
pulled to the right with enormous power most likley ripping off that arm 
unless the bot had some type of super glue holding him togeather. To make 
sure her through out his fire energy wich would incenerate it on contact. 
When his tail had wrapped aroung the left shoulder the end stuck into the 
bots ribs.  Sucking out his mech fluid and into galvatron. His green jewel 
glowed and shot a beam right through the bots upper back area. Wich would 
come out his middle chest.his knee guns shoit multiple energys into the bots 
sides. Galvatron smiled with his teeth in the bots right shoulder as the 
flame energy came out with a muffle sound he said.... "Some things just 
shouldnt tast like chicken."
